overview: Carlos is a tormented young man who reflects in bitter loneliness on the terrible events that led to an accident in which he and his parents were involved. Carlos recalls happy family moments, but he also remembers his father's angry claim upon discovering his big secret, that he is homosexual. Carlos begs for "A second chance" to talk about what was trapped in his heart; at that moment he opens his eyes to reality.
title: La segunda oportunidad
